模块 com.example.demo
程序包 com.example.demo.Actor.Boss.ParentBoss

类 Boss

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.image.ImageView
com.example.demo.Actor.ActiveActor
com.example.demo.Actor.ActiveActorDestructible
com.example.demo.Actor.FighterPlane
com.example.demo.Actor.Boss.ParentBoss.Boss
所有已实现的接口:
Destructible, javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
直接已知子类:
MutationBoss1, MutationBoss2, MutationBoss3
public class Boss extends FighterPlane
The Boss class represents a boss enemy in the game, extending the FighterPlane class. It manages the boss's health, movement patterns, projectile firing, and shield mechanics. The boss can move vertically, fire projectiles in different patterns, and activate a shield randomly.

This class is responsible for updating the boss's state, including its position, shield status, and firing projectiles. It also handles the boss's movement pattern and the mechanics of shield activation and exhaustion.

  • 属性概要

    • IMAGE_NAME

      private static final String IMAGE_NAME
      The image file name for the boss. This image is used to represent the boss visually in the game.

      private static final double INITIAL_X_POSITION
      The initial X position of the boss. This position defines where the boss will start in the game world.
      另请参阅:

    • INITIAL_Y_POSITION

      private static final double INITIAL_Y_POSITION
      The initial Y position of the boss. This defines the starting vertical position of the boss.
      另请参阅:
      • 常量字段值

    • BOSS_FIRE_RATE

      private static final double BOSS_FIRE_RATE
      The probability of the boss firing a projectile in each frame. This value determines how likely it is for the boss to fire a projectile during each game frame.
      另请参阅:
      • 常量字段值

    • BOSS_SHIELD_PROBABILITY

      private static final double BOSS_SHIELD_PROBABILITY
      The probability of the boss activating its shield. This value defines the chance that the boss will activate its shield in any given frame.
      另请参阅:
      • 常量字段值

    • IMAGE_WIDTH

      private static final int IMAGE_WIDTH
      The width of the boss image. This value defines the horizontal size of the boss image when rendered on screen.
      另请参阅:
      • 常量字段值

    • IMAGE_HEIGHT

      private static final int IMAGE_HEIGHT
      The height of the boss image. This value defines the vertical size of the boss image when rendered on screen.
      另请参阅:
      • 常量字段值

    • VERTICAL_VELOCITY

      private static final int VERTICAL_VELOCITY
      The vertical velocity for the boss's movement. This value determines how much the boss moves vertically in each update frame.
      另请参阅:
      • 常量字段值

    • MAX_FRAMES_WITH_SAME_MOVE

      private static final int MAX_FRAMES_WITH_SAME_MOVE
      The maximum number of frames the boss can move in the same direction. This is the upper limit for consecutive movements in the same direction before the boss changes direction.
      另请参阅:
      • 常量字段值

    • Y_UPPER_BOUND

      private static final int Y_UPPER_BOUND
      The upper bound for the boss's vertical position (Y). This defines the highest Y-coordinate the boss can move to before stopping.
      另请参阅:
      • 常量字段值

    • Y_LOWER_BOUND

      private static final int Y_LOWER_BOUND
      The lower bound for the boss's vertical position (Y). This defines the lowest Y-coordinate the boss can move to before stopping.
      另请参阅:
      • 常量字段值

    • MAX_FRAMES_WITH_SHIELD

      private static final int MAX_FRAMES_WITH_SHIELD
      The maximum number of frames the shield can stay active. This defines how long the boss's shield can remain activated before it is deactivated.
      另请参阅:
      • 常量字段值

    • MOVE_FREQUENCY_PER_CYCLE

      private static final int MOVE_FREQUENCY_PER_CYCLE
      The frequency of movement changes in a cycle. This value defines how often the boss's movement pattern changes during a cycle of movements.
      另请参阅:
      • 常量字段值

    • ZERO

      private static final int ZERO
      A constant representing zero movement. This value is used to signify that the boss should remain stationary for a particular frame.
      另请参阅:
      • 常量字段值

    • movePattern

      private final List<Integer> movePattern
      The list defining the movement pattern for the boss. This list contains alternating vertical movements and some stationary moves. The boss's movement is randomized in each cycle.

    • firePattern

      private final BossFirePattern firePattern
      The boss's fire pattern manager. This object manages the boss's projectile firing patterns and types.

    • isShielded

      private boolean isShielded
      Whether the boss is currently shielded. This boolean flag tracks the shield status of the boss.

    • consecutiveMovesInSameDirection

      private int consecutiveMovesInSameDirection
      The counter for consecutive moves the boss has made in the same direction. This value helps to determine when to change the direction of the boss's movement.

    • indexOfCurrentMove

      private int indexOfCurrentMove
      The index for the current move in the boss's movement pattern. This index is used to track the boss's current move in the predefined movement pattern.

    • framesWithShieldActivated

      private int framesWithShieldActivated
      The counter for frames that the shield has been activated. This value tracks how long the shield has been active, so it can be deactivated after a certain period.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • Boss

      public Boss(int initialHealth)
      Constructs a Boss object with the specified initial health.

      This constructor initializes the boss with its starting position, health, movement pattern, and other attributes. The boss's fire pattern manager is also initialized in this constructor.

      参数:
      initialHealth - The initial health of the boss.

  • 方法详细资料

    • initializeMovePattern

      private void initializeMovePattern()
      Initializes the movement pattern for the boss.

      The pattern contains alternating vertical movements and some stationary moves. The pattern is shuffled to randomize the boss's movement behavior during each cycle.

    • updateActor

      public void updateActor()
      Updates the boss's state, including position, shield, health bar, and hitbox.

      This method is called every frame to update the boss's state and ensure proper behavior during the game loop.

      指定者:
      updateActor 在类中 ActiveActorDestructible

    • updatePosition

      public void updatePosition()
      Updates the boss's position based on its movement pattern.

      This method ensures the boss stays within vertical bounds, preventing it from moving off-screen or outside the allowed area.

      指定者:
      updatePosition 在类中 ActiveActorDestructible

    • updateShield

      private void updateShield()
      Updates the shield status, activating or deactivating it based on probabilities and usage time.

      This method checks whether the shield should be activated and whether it has been active for too long, in which case it will be deactivated.

    • fireProjectiles

      public List<ActiveActorDestructible> fireProjectiles()
      Fires projectiles based on the boss's current attack type.

      This method selects an attack type using the fire pattern manager and returns the list of projectiles to be fired by the boss.

      指定者:
      fireProjectiles 在类中 FighterPlane
      返回:
      A list of projectiles fired by the boss.

    • takeDamage

      public void takeDamage()
      Reduces the boss's health by 1 if not shielded and updates the health bar.

      This method is called when the boss takes damage from the player or other game entities.

      指定者:
      takeDamage 在接口中 Destructible
      覆盖:
      takeDamage 在类中 FighterPlane

    • bossFiresInCurrentFrame

      private boolean bossFiresInCurrentFrame()
      Determines if the boss fires a projectile in the current frame.

      This method checks if the boss should fire a projectile based on the defined fire rate.

      返回:
      True if the boss fires a projectile, false otherwise.

    • shieldShouldBeActivated

      private boolean shieldShouldBeActivated()
      Determines if the shield should be activated.

      This method checks if the boss's shield should be activated based on the defined shield probability.

      返回:
      True if the shield should be activated, false otherwise.

    • shieldExhausted

      private boolean shieldExhausted()
      Determines if the shield has been activated for too long.

      This method checks if the shield has been active for longer than the maximum allowed duration.

      返回:
      True if the shield is exhausted, false otherwise.

    • activateShield

      private void activateShield()
      Activates the boss's shield.

      This method sets the boss's shield to active and starts tracking its duration.

    • deactivateShield

      private void deactivateShield()
      Deactivates the boss's shield.

      This method deactivates the boss's shield and resets the shield duration counter.

    • getShielded

      public boolean getShielded()
      Gets whether the boss is currently shielded.

      This method returns the current shield status of the boss.

      返回:
      True if the boss is shielded, false otherwise.

    • getNextMove

      private int getNextMove()
      Gets the next move in the movement pattern for the boss.

      This method returns the next vertical movement value for the boss from its movement pattern, ensuring that the boss moves according to its defined behavior.

      返回:
      The next move for the boss in the pattern.
